publ: by VayuVaidya: Dr Bheemaiah, Anil Kumar
name: MahaYogiTalesSiddhartha
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
MahaYogi, is a story sequence by Mutter Gottlich to illustrate like the parables, stories of spirituality, packaged in a sugar pill for mass consumption. In this era of consumerism and entertainment, spirituality has to be adopted towards technology, work theology and the faster pace of life. MahaYogi was created as the medium, a mascot for Mutter Gottlich and these stories describe dialogues between science and religion and timeless spirituality tailored to post modernism. 

Use Alexa Open Flash Briefing to listen to this tale, by adding MahaYogi Tales to your flash briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
